title: Thoughts please!
content:
Hey gang,

Just looking for some thoughts and opinions on this. I finally got some ideas from paper to Illustrator.  
Its also my first real forray into type design so go easy on me!

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [test.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419050657/http:/typophile.com/files/test_4.jpg) | 76.03 KB |
author: outlook

comments.content: Interesting take on a quasi-rubricated modern sans. I'd move the rubricated mark over more.

I would consider making the 'bites' in the right side of the B & R deeper to help the letters differentiate. There is always a balance between making letters belong to each other & making them individual. You have maybe gone too far in making them match too completely.

Thanks for the advice guys,

I agree with both of you!

Hopefully ill have some time to play with this some more and post an update.

Cheers!
